import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Unbond phase-1 delegation"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/unbonding"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Unbonds a phase-1 delegation by processing the provided transaction details. This endpoint will be deprecated once all phase-1 delegations are either withdrawn or registered into phase-2.
This is an async operation.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"staker_signed_signature_hex":{"type":"string"},"staking_tx_hash_hex":{"type":"string"},"unbonding_tx_hash_hex":{"type":"string"},"unbonding_tx_hex":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"v1handlers.UnbondDelegationRequestPayload"}}},"description":"Unbonding Request Payload","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"202":{"description":"Request accepted and will be processed asynchronously"},"400":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"err":{},"errorCode":{"enum":["INTERNAL_SERVICE_ERROR","VALIDATION_ERROR","NOT_FOUND","BAD_REQUEST","FORBIDDEN","UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY","REQUEST_TIMEOUT"],"type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["InternalServiceError","ValidationError","NotFound","BadRequest","Forbidden","UnprocessableEntity","RequestTimeout"],"title":"types.ErrorCode"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer"}},"type":"object","title":"github_com_babylonlabs-io_staking-api-service_internal_shared_types.Error"}}},"description":"Invalid request payload"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
